title: The Incredibles
short_plot_summary: A family of superheroes must save the world while trying to live a normal life and hide their superpowers.
explanation: A male superhero, representing Mr. Incredible, the father and main character of the movie
A female superhero, symbolizing Elastigirl, the mother and supporting character of the movie
A boy, depicting the three children in the family, who also have superhero powers
Lightning, illustrating the superpowers and action-adventure aspects of the movie
A robot, representing Syndrome's destructive weapon, the Omnidroid, which the Incredibles must defeat
